description: This file contains JUnit 5 test cases for verifying JPA entity mappings and repository interactions within the 'com.example.devdiarybackend.domain' package. It tests persistence and retrieval of User, Log, LogEntry, and Summary entities through their respective repositories.

classes.name: EntityMappingTest
classes.description: JUnit test class to validate JPA entity mappings and repository behaviors for User, Log, LogEntry, and Summary entities.

methods.name: persistUserLogAndEntries_andQuery
methods.description: Test creating and saving a User, Log, and LogEntry entities and querying logs by user ID and date to confirm persistence and relationship mappings.

methods.name: persistSummary_uniqueByUserAndDate
methods.description: Test creating a Summary entity for a User, saving it, and retrieving it to verify correct persistence and query behavior for summaries identified by user and date.
